Contributor: Annison, Edward S., artist.; Liberty Loan Committee.; Elbridge Co., printer.;
Note: Signed "Edward S. Annison." Date from the text of the advertisement. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Design for a newspaper and magazine advertisement for a Liberty Loan campaign.  Account of the hospital ship Llandovery Castle, which was "sunk without a trace" by German submarines on June 27, 1918. Wipe out the German enemy by buying more bonds with all the money you have.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: "Spurlos Versenkt"
